text: Disney star Adam Hicks will remain in jail as he undergoes a mental health evaluation to determine whether he is competent enough to stand trial for armed robbery charges in California, RadarOnline. com can report exclusively. A judge on May 10 appointed a doctor to help determine the former Zeke and Luther star ’ s current mental state, said Ricardo Santiago, a spokesman for the Los Angeles District Attorney ’ s Office. SEE THE SHOCKING COURT DOCS HERE S. W. A. T. officers arrested Hicks and his girlfriend, aspiring actress Danni Tamburo, on January 24 after the troubled couple were linked to a string of robberies in Burbank, Calif.
